tool_description: Calculates conveyor throughput rates based on belt speed measurements and physical belt specifications.

belt_speeds.description: Array of belt speed measurements in meters per minute

material_density.description: Material density in kg per cubic meter (1-10000)

load_height.description: Average material load height on belt in meters (0.001-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid speed data: belt_speeds array cannot be empty and must contain positive values. Ensure speed measurements are valid.
Invalid belt dimensions: belt_width must be between 0.1 and 10.0 meters. Check belt specification documentation.
Invalid material density: material_density must be between 1 and 10000 kg/mÂ³. Verify material properties.
Invalid load height: load_height must be between 0.001 and 1.0 meters. Measure actual material height on belt.
Invalid efficiency factor: efficiency_factor must be between 0.1 and 1.0. Use typical values around 0.8-0.9.
usage: Provide belt speed measurements, belt dimensions, and material properties. The tool calculates theoretical and actual throughput rates.

average_throughput.description: Average throughput in kg per hour

max_throughput.description: Maximum throughput achieved in kg per hour

min_throughput.description: Minimum throughput achieved in kg per hour
